name: Mama Shelter Marseille
address: 64 Rue De La Loubiere, 13006 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: More than just rooms or restaurants, Mama Shelter is a place for living and meeting, a true urban refuge that is beautiful, modern and full of spirit but also folksy, inviting and sexy. Make yourself comfortable on one of our sofas to sample our sharing p latters, have a drink, relax and sleep like a baby. Mama will take care of everything!accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Hotel Croisette Beach Cannes - MGallery
description: Relish our chic, Bohemian-style rooms at the Croisette Beach Cannes MGallery hotel. A unique haven with every amenity: heated outdoor pool and garden, private beach, bar, room service, meeting room, and fitness center. An ideal place for your stay in the heart of Cannes nearby the Croisette and Palais des Festivals. Reserve your sun lounger on our private beach, subject to availability (extra charge).accorhotels.com

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.
